name: Hard Candy
description:
If the controls don't work, try clicking on the game window

Protect your teeth by passing along the golden crown.
Headbutt it at the correct time to pass it along with speed!

Made for the SEA Game Jam 2021 in 48 hours, with the theme "Crown"
Art - Shawn Wong
Sound & Music - Alex Wong
Code - Aqil Hilmi
